text: int main ( ) { int test ; scanf ( "%d" , & test ) ; while ( test -- ) { int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int ar [ n ] ; int i ; long long int count = 0 , sum = 0 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & ar [ i ] ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { count ++ ; if ( i == n - 1 || ar [ i ] > ar [ i + 1 ] ) { sum += ( count ) * ( count + 1 ) / 2 ; count = 0 ; } } printf ( "%lld\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
